description: Develop and maintain internal and external web applications serving over 1.5 million users.
Create user interfaces encompassing authentication, interactions, responsive layouts, and styling.
Implement RESTful APIs and microservices architecture to facilitate seamless communication between front-endand back-end systems.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams using Agile methodologies to ensure alignment with business objectives and user needs.
Developed and maintained website updates and enhancements using Wix Code for custom functionality.
Integrated secure payment gateways and e-commerce functionalities for streamlined transactions, yielding an annual revenue exceeding $500K.
Optimized website performance and SEO strategies.
Monitored website analytics and user feedback to identify areas for improvement and implement data-driven strategies.
Collaborated closely with clients to understand project requirements, provide technical recommendations, and deliver solutions to exceed business needs and objectives.
Developed dynamic websites and applications using React.js.

experiences.position: Multimedia Assets and Information Management Intern
description: Leveraged SEO techniques and Google Analytics to increase website traffic.
Created and managed media database system with over 1,000 assets.

projects.title: IBM Training
projects.descriptions: This application serves as a comprehensive platform for individuals and organizations to access a diverse range of courses and resources aimed at enhancing technology skills. My involvement ensured seamless user experiences and efficient functionality, contributing to the platform's success in empowering learners worldwide.

projects.title: FA Euro Official Site
projects.descriptions: This platform offers the latest news on the club, seamless purchasing of club merchandise, and a hub for active players. I ensured smooth functionality and user-friendly navigation, empowering users to engage with the club and manage their transactions efficiently.

projects.title: PCI Media Website
projects.descriptions: Acomprehensive website offering insights into PCI Media's initiatives, providing a platform for impactful storytelling, and facilitating donations to support their cause. I helped enhance the website's functionality, making it an effective tool for promoting social and environmental change worldwide.
